ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We seized them with the punishment, but they did not go low before their Lord; nor will they humble themselves
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We had seized them with the punishment, but they did not bow before their Lord nor turned to Him in humility,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (They are such) that We seized them with chastisement (and yet) they did not humble themselves before their Lord, nor do they entreat
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We struck them with torment, but they did not submit themselves to their Lord, nor did they make themselves humble
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We grasped them with punishment, so neither did they submit themselves to their Lord, nor do they cry humbly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We seized them with punishment, but they humbled not themselves to their Lord, nor did they invoke with submission to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And already We overtook them with chastisement, but they were not submissive to their Lord, nor do they humble themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We already seized them with the chastisement, yet they abased not themselves to their Lord nor were they humble;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Already have We grasped them with punishment, but they humble not themselves unto their Lord, nor do they pray,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We seized them with the punishment, but they did not surrender to their Lord, nor will they humble themselves
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We took hold of them with the torment, yet they humbled not themselves to their Lord, nor did they entreat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We have already seized them with punishment, yet they did not humble themselves before their Lord, nor will they entreat [Him for mercy]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We inflicted Punishment on them, but they humbled not themselves to their Lord, nor do they submissively entreat (Him)!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We seized them with punishment, but they humbled not themselves to their Lord, nor did they invoke (Allah) with submission to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Already We have seized them with the punishment, but they neither humbled themselves to their Lord, nor did they beseech Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We have already gripped them with suffering, but they did not surrender to their Lord, nor did they humble themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had gripped them with suffering [as a warning], but they did not yield to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate, [and will continue thus]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:76] And We have already seized them with chastisement, [with] hunger, yet they did not humble themselves to their Lord, nor did they devote themselves to prayer, [nor] did they seek [the pleasure of] God through supplication.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Already have We grasped them with punishment) with hunger and drought, (but they humble not themselves unto their Lord) but they did not submit themselves to their Lord by professing Allah's divine Oneness, (nor do they pray) nor do they believe,
